top_10.description: A horrifying tale of a young girl possessed by a demon.
A chilling tale of a family's descent into darkness as they uncover a terrifying, inherited curse.
A family is terrorized by dark forces after moving into a new home. Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren are called to help them.
A psychological horror film where a family is haunted by terrifying supernatural forces while staying in an isolated hotel.
A terrifying horror film about a group of friends who encounter a family of cannibals and a chainsaw-wielding maniac in rural Texas.
A journalist investigates a mysterious videotape that causes anyone who watches it to die in seven days.
A masked killer, Michael Myers, escapes a mental institution and returns to his hometown to terrorize a babysitter and her friends on Halloween night.
True-crime writer Ellison Oswalt discovers a box of home movies that put his family in great danger as he uncovers a supernatural force tied to the horrific events.
A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.
A group of bullied kids band together when a monster, taking the appearance of a clown, begins hunting children.

thriller.description: A group of kids in the town of Derry, Maine, face a shape-shifting entity that exploits the fears of its victims, particularly a demonic clown named Pennywise.

details.producer: Roy Lee, Dan Lin, Seth Grahame-Smith, David Katzenberg

thriller.description: A group of friends visit a deserted colony, only to experience supernatural horrors. The horror intensifies as they uncover the dark secrets of the place.
A woman seeks revenge against those who wronged her and her family, as she becomes involved in a chilling series of supernatural events.
A couple begins to experience terrifying events when they are gifted a vintage doll that is possessed by an evil spirit.
A group of people survive a deadly accident after a series of premonitions, but they soon realize that Death itself is coming after them one by one.
In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

details.producer: Michael Bay, Andrew Form, Brad Fuller

thriller.description: A supernatural horror thriller about a struggling single mother who becomes entangled in the haunting mysteries surrounding an abandoned movie theater.
A chilling dive into the mind of a disturbed individual, exploring themes of madness, brutality, and the terrifying depths of human depravity.
A family inherits a luxurious glass mansion, unaware that it houses vengeful spirits and a deadly secret.
A horrifying tale of three filmmakers who venture into Ukraine to document the story of a cannibalistic spirit.

real_horror.description: A chilling story of a family terrorized by paranormal forces in their new home, based on real-life events.
The Warrens travel to north London to help a single mother whose children are being tormented by an angry spirit.
A social worker and her children are drawn into a frightening supernatural world when a troubled mother is accused of child endangerment and haunted by the ghostly figure of La Llorona.
A young girl is left alone with her siblings and is drawn into a terrifying world after using a Ouija board to contact her deceased father, unleashing a malevolent force.
A mother seeks the help of two priests to rid her daughter of a demonic possession that has taken over her body.
A journalist investigates a case of a nun's death, leading her to uncover terrifying truths about an alleged demonic possession.
The prequel to Annabelle, revealing the origin of the possessed doll as a group of orphans and a nun become its victims.
A grieving mother battles her son's fear of a monster lurking in their home, only to discover a sinister presence is haunting them.
A group of teenagers is stalked by a masked killer who targets them based on horror movie tropes. As they try to uncover the identity of the killer, they must confront their worst fears.

details.story: Kuchisake Onna, also known as the 'Slit-Mouthed Woman,' is an urban legend originating from Japan. The legend tells of a woman who was mutilated by her husband and left with a gaping mouth from ear to ear. She wears a surgical mask and asks people if they think she's beautiful. If they say 'no,' she kills them. If they say 'yes,' she removes her mask to reveal her horrifying face and asks again. The legend gained traction in the late 1970s and spread across Japan, particularly in the urban areas of Tokyo and Osaka. There were also reports of sightings and claims that the legend was real, causing fear and panic across the country.

The real Annabelle doll is a Raggedy Ann doll that was reportedly haunted. It was given to a nursing student named Donna in 1970. The doll was said to exhibit disturbing behavior, such as moving on its own, leaving notes behind, and causing strange occurrences in the apartment. After seeking help from a medium, Donna and her roommate learned that the doll was being controlled by a spirit of a young girl named Annabelle. The situation escalated, and they contacted paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren. The Warrens took the doll and placed it in their occult museum in Connecticut, where it remains behind glass, reportedly still haunted.

The Okiku doll is a haunted doll that is believed to be possessed by the spirit of a young girl named Okiku. The doll was purchased in 1918 by a man for his sister, who later died of a fever. After the girl's death, it is said that the doll's hair began to grow, and no one could explain why. The doll was kept in a temple in Japan, where it has become famous for its eerie supernatural presence. The hair continues to grow, and it is believed to be connected to the spirit of the deceased girl, who may be trying to communicate with the living.

Robert the Doll is a haunted doll that has been the subject of numerous paranormal reports and stories. The doll was given to a young boy named Robert Eugene Otto in the early 1900s by a servant who was reportedly skilled in voodoo. The doll began to exhibit strange behavior, such as moving on its own and making eerie sounds. It is said that Robert was deeply attached to the doll, often blaming it for any mischief he got into. Over the years, the doll became infamous, and those who encountered it often reported feeling uneasy, with some claiming it cursed them. The doll is currently on display at the East Martello Museum in Key West, where it continues to attract visitors hoping to witness its supernatural presence.

The Enfield Poltergeist is one of the most famous paranormal cases of the 20th century. It involved the Hodgson family, particularly two sisters, who experienced strange occurrences like furniture moving, objects being thrown, and loud knocking sounds. The haunting became widely known when paranormal investigators and journalists visited the house. Many believed the events were caused by an entity that physically assaulted the family members. The case was widely debated, with some claiming it was a hoax, while others were convinced it was a genuine supernatural event.

The Bell Witch is a famous haunting that terrorized the Bell family in early 19th-century Tennessee. The spirit, believed to be that of a woman named Kate Batts, allegedly tormented the family by causing strange noises, physical attacks, and even death. The haunting was so severe that it caught the attention of Andrew Jackson, who allegedly investigated the case. The Bell Witch is regarded as one of the most notable hauntings in American history.

The Dyatlov Pass Incident involves the mysterious deaths of nine experienced hikers, led by Igor Dyatlov, who were found dead under strange and unexplained circumstances in the Ural Mountains. The hikers' tent was found slashed open from the inside, and their bodies were discovered in various stages of undress, some with internal injuries. Theories about the cause of death include an avalanche, a military accident, and paranormal activity, but no conclusive explanation has been found.

The Myrtles Plantation, built in 1796, is considered one of the most haunted locations in the United States. The plantation is said to be home to numerous ghosts, including a former slave named Chloe, who was allegedly executed after poisoning the family she served. Visitors have reported sightings of ghostly figures, strange noises, and other paranormal activity. The plantation's haunted reputation draws tourists and ghost hunters from around the world.

real_story.movie_name: The Haunted Painting of Crying Boy

details.story: The Crying Boy painting became infamous in the UK during the 1980s after a series of mysterious house fires were reported, in which the painting was found to be completely undamaged. The phenomenon led to rumors that the painting was cursed and caused fires. In some cases, families who owned the painting reported bad luck and misfortune. The painting’s association with these strange occurrences made it one of the most famous haunted artworks in history.

real_story.movie_name: The Haunting of the Lutz Family

details.story: The Lutz family moved into a house where a gruesome mass murder had occurred a year prior, committed by Ronald DeFeo Jr. The Lutz family claimed to experience terrifying paranormal events, including doors slamming, voices calling their names, and a sense of overwhelming dread. The haunting was so severe that they left the house after only 28 days. The events surrounding the Lutz family became famous after their account was published and later adapted into a series of films.
